data.quote: The bamboo that bends is stronger than the oak that resists.
data.author: A Japanese Proverb

data.quote: Be open minded. Be hopeful. Be impatient.
data.author: Sunder Pichai

data.quote: There are certain queer times and occassions in this mixed affair we call life, when a man takes his whole universe for a vast practical joke. Though the wit thereof he but dimly discerns and more than suspects that the joke is at nobody's expense, but his own.
data.author: From Moby-Dick; or, The Whale by Herman Melville

data.quote: We often contradict an opinion for no other reason than that we do not like the tone in which it is expressed.
data.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

data.quote: Get the fundamentals down and the level of everything you do will rise.
data.author: Michael Jordan

data.quote: We write to taste the life twice, in the moment and in retrospect.
data.author: Michael Jordan
